name: pnp-list-formatting-birthdays
title: Birthdays
shortDescription: This sample shows how to format a list to show upcoming employee birthdays.
longDescription: This sample shows how to format a list to show upcoming employee birthdays.

metadata.value: ms-bgColor-themeLighterAlt, ms-fontColor-themePrimary--hover, ms-fontColor-neutralPrimary, ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary, ms-fontColor-neutralTertiary, ms-fontWeight-regular, ms-fontWeight-semibold, ms-fontWeight-semilight, ms-fontSize-l, ms-fontSize-m, ms-fontSize-s, ms-fontSize-xs

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
